channel.title: C.Zhang – Clifford Alumni
channel.description: 一时祈福人，一世祈福人。

item.title: 181122 Speakers Event
item.dc:creator: C.Zhang
item.description: Clifford Alumni祈福校友会将于11月22日下周四晚7:00-8:30在英校中学部212教室举办本学期第一次校友经验分享活动。届时会有两位在美国及英国留学的校友回校与同学们分享他们的申请过程和留学体验。欢迎有意向出国留学的同学们踊跃参加！

item.title: Clifford Alumni Secretariat Recruitment
item.dc:creator: C.Zhang
item.description:
Clifford Alumni (CA) is the only official alumni network endorsed by Clifford School (Guangzhou, China). Since last November, the Clifford Alumni Secretariat (CAS), along with members of CA, have successfully hosted numerous events for current students at Clifford. Recently, CAS is honoured to have invited Irene Lou for a keynote speech at this year’s senior …

Continue reading "Clifford Alumni Secretariat Recruitment"

item.title: CA Logo
item.dc:creator: C.Zhang
item.description: ​CA徽章由英校校徽形变而来。CS中的”S” (School) 形变为”A” (Alumni) 并取消了校徽中的圆形包围设计. 在字体不改动的情况下， CA的标志较校徽颜色更深， 表达了广大学子在英校学习的过程中历经磨练，提炼并内化了英校精神的精髓。 在英校的学习过程中， 英校学子也变得沉稳， 内敛。 颜色中若隐若现的渐变背景色也传达了英校学子的拼搏精神。 设计者： 张斯盛。
